attributes.action: Cancel tuition fees for University Students for the 2020/2021 academic year
attributes.additional_details: Tonight, Boris Johnson has once again left University students in the dark about their future. Not even once mentioning university students in his nationwide address. England is to enter a lockdown with immediate effect and Universities are closed from tomorrow, all learning is now remote until mid-February. Deadlines are due in just a few weeks, final year students are expected to finish this spring and rent on empty student properties is still expected to be paid. We deserve to be heard
attributes.background: Cancel all tuition fees for university students for the 2020/2021 academic year and reimburse students their maintenance loans to cover the cost of rent

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
